DRUM Vinsmaking
Om DRUM

Welcome to DRUM, where the passion for wine converges with the expertise of six middle-aged connoisseurs. Beyond our monthly tastings lies a meticulously curated digital database, capturing every detail of our vinous explorations. From tasting notes to vintage comparisons, our website serves as a comprehensive repository of wine knowledge. Dive into our virtual cellar, where each entry is meticulously cataloged with ratings, flavor profiles, and regional insights. Whether you're seeking recommendations or simply delving into the world of wine, DRUM offers a gateway to a wealth of information and enjoyment, inviting you to embark on this data-driven journey with us.

Smakerene er Magne Johnsen, Lars-Petter og de andre
